text:
Dramatic drop of new #SARSCoV2 infections among health care workers after the first dose of the BNT162b2 mRNA #COVID19 #vaccine 

New infections declined by 62% at 2-4 weeks after the first dose and virtually disappeared after the 2d dose of #CovidVaccine
